data.name: AMA Office Hours - How to get customers in the new normal
data.summary:
Topics Covered:
1. What is currently happening in the Indian landscape?
2. How are companies adapting to it?
3. How are some of the businesses acquiring customers?
4. What are some of the sectors that are seeing traction
5. How can solo entrepreneurs, consultants, freelancers get gigs in the next 12-18 months.
